function.name: addRadioGroup
function.description:
Add a radiogroup for radiobuttons. A radiogroup groups together all radiobuttons that are added after the group is added. From all radiobuttons that belong to the same radiogroup only one can be checked at a time.
If no radiogroup is added, one is created automatically when the first radiobutton is added.
function.summary: Add a radiogroup for radiobuttons.

function.summary: Show or hide the statusbar.
function.sample: // hide the statusbar plugins.window.setStatusBarVisible(false);

function.name: setToolBarAreaVisible
function.description: Show or hide the toolbar area.
function.summary: Show or hide the toolbar area.
function.sample: // hide the toolbar area plugins.window.setToolBarAreaVisible(false);
